title: We Are One(tricks)!
body:
the benefits of focusing on 1 or 2 champions are multiple and obvious to those who chose to overcome the drawbacks. I believe the benefits can be propagated amongst a team as well. imagine if you will a team with the experience of a thousand games and the macro focus of one tricks. imagine being intimately familiar with each matchup as the game changes patch by patch.
you can see where im going with this.
add a reply as an expression of interest and if you <3 this project leave an upvote or a downvote because this message is along term post.
